You'll be asked to log into your campus account before you can view or create a new ticket.


Tips to improve your Service Catalog experience
Requesting Services and Help OnlineRefresh Module

You can easily request services and help online, using the Chico State IT Support website.
Browsing Services

Click on the "Services" tab above, or the large red "Request Service" button below "Live Chat"
Browse through the service categories until you find the service you want
If the service is requestable online, click on the "Request Service" button and fill out the form to request service or help. Your request will be immediately routed to the appropriate technicians.

Searching for Services

Click on the "Services" tab, above
Click on the "Search" tab in the secondary navigation bar
Enter what you are looking for in the Search field and press Enter
Click on the service you want
If the service is requestable online, click on the "Request Service" button and fill out the form to request service or help. Your request will be immediately routed to the appropriate technicians.

You can also use the general search bar at the top-right corner of the page, but that will include search results for the knowledge base as well as services.

Helpful Hint: Use the dropdown to filter your search:
                                   
News & AnnouncementsRefresh Module
Scam Emails Targeting Campus Accounts
Wed 4/19/23 10:26 AM
Campus accounts have been targeted by a few scam and phishing emails this week. Examples are provided below. Do not reply to these emails or click on the links. Unsolicited job offers are likely to be scams, especially if they’re offering to pay $150+/hour. Do not reply to this email and be cautious of requests […]

Emergency Network Maintenance
Fri 3/3/23 3:45 PM
Due to the network outage the campus experienced last Sunday night, emergency network maintenance is required to resume the redundancy for our internet connection from CENIC, our internet service provider. The emergency network maintenance will occur Saturday morning from 3:00 – 4:00 AM. We do not anticipate any interruption of services, but if we do, […]

Network Refresh Project
Thu 2/23/23 11:24 AM
The Division of IT will begin upgrading network ports in all state-supported buildings from February 27 – March 17. The crew is working on an overnight schedule in an effort to avoid any network or power outages during normal operating hours.    A complete installation schedule for each building can be found here: https://www.csuchico.edu/ccsv/projects/network-projects/network-refresh-project.shtml  The campus community […]

LastPass Security Incident
Fri 12/23/22 11:54 AM
LastPass may have notified you regarding a recent security incident involving unauthorized access to their environment. Please note that campus-managed LastPass accounts are not at risk. However, be very cautious of any phishing email message that asks you to provide information claiming they are from LastPass, especially if you are asked to provide your LastPass […]

Voicemail Service Interruption
Wed 12/21/22 9:11 AM
UPDATE: Telecommunication Services has restored voicemail service and we do not anticipate further service interruption. The cause of the outage was an inadvertently disabled network adapter on the new voicemail server. Soon after the migration of the voicemail system was complete, the service became unavailable to users. Technicians are working on the issue with no […]
